title: Coding Style
text: version number follows format major.minor.patch.dev. different parts version represent different things: major - significant change package expected break users code. updated rarely package redesigned way. minor - minor version update means new functionality added package. might new functions improvements existing functions compatible existing code. patch - Patch updates bug fixes. solve existing issues don’t anything new.
